argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpdiv.1 | |- X = ran G |
| 2 |  | grpdiv.2 | |- N = ( inv ` G ) |
| 3 |  | grpdiv.3 | |- D = ( /g ` G ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_grpoinvcl | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` B ) e. X ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` B ) e. X ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_grpodivval | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ ( N ` B ) e. X ) -> ( A D ( N ` B ) ) = ( A G ( N ` ( N ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syld3an3 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A D ( N ` B ) ) = ( A G ( N ` ( N ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2 | #P_grpo2inv | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( N ` B ) ) = B ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( N ` B ) ) = B ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A G ( N ` ( N ` B ) ) ) = ( A G B ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A D ( N ` B ) ) = ( A G B ) ) |
